amount.header: 您的爱心将会全数送到商家手里，帮助他们负担营运支出。您的网上交易资料将会做加密处理，款项会直接交给商家以支持他们。

buyMeal.subheader: Send Chinatown Love will connect merchants with local organizations that will distribute your gifted meals to our community in need.

buyMeal.explanationFirst: By gifting a meal, your donation will still go directly to the merchant.
buyMeal.explanationSecond: Our partners will then distribute vouchers with those who can benefit the most from a free meal.

merchantsPage.platformInfoDescription: 我们提供線上平台來帮助受到疫情影响，不会使用科技，只收现金的亚裔传统商家。
merchantsPage.platformInfoAction: 我们透过募款以及贩售礼品券来帮助这些商家。
merchantsPage.flyerAsk: 认识需要协助的小型商家业者？

donationPool.description1: 捐献到爱心池来支持我们的每间商家！我们会把你的捐款平均分配给各商家。。

contributionBar.footer: 所有的收益将会全数送到所需的商家手里。

descriptionBox.header: 我们在找的小型商家业者
descriptionBox.bullet1: 亚裔移民经营的小型商家
descriptionBox.bullet2: 英语上不流畅，以现金收入为主，或者不太懂网上新科技
descriptionBox.bullet3: 现在财务受困，影响到付房租，付水电费，及发工资给员工的能力
descriptionBox.bullet4: 沒有网站，网上外卖，或接受礼品券的服务
descriptionBox.bullet5: 在纽约曼哈顿，法拉盛，或宾臣墟

lyftReward.mainBody1: Thanks for participating in the Send Chinatown Love Food Crawl!
lyftReward.mainBody2: In partnership with Lyft, we are giving away free Citi Bike Day Passes to help you get around Chinatown.
lyftReward.mainBody3: Would you like a free Citi Bike Day Pass?
lyftReward.successBody2: Please check your email for your Citi Bike Day Pass code!
lyftReward.failureBody2: It looks like we ran out of the Citi Bike Day Pass codes. Stay tuned for more giveaways in the future!
lyftReward.codeTitle: Here is your Free Lyft Citi Bike Day Pass code

lightUpChinatown.headerSubtext: Let’s light up Chinatown, one lantern at a time.
lightUpChinatown.summaryBody1: Now that outdoor dining is extended year round, we want Chinatown streets to be amply lit for diners and residents.
lightUpChinatown.summaryBody2: Support the Light Up Chinatown project by contributing to “Adopt-A-Lantern!” In addition to light fixtures being installed, beautiful outdoor lanterns will be hung along Mott Street from Canal to Bayard to welcome patrons into our wonderful community, right in time for the holidays.
lightUpChinatown.summaryBody3: Purchasing a lantern will act as a donation towards the Light Up Chinatown project and with your contributions, we can represent Chinatown to be the vibrant and NYC cultural icon it has always been. This project is so important to show Chinatown is open for business and together, we are on our way to recovery.
lightUpChinatown.summaryBody4: Send Chinatown Love along with Pearl River Mart, 46 Mott St Bakery, CCBA, Chinese Chamber of Commerce and UDO are partnering to raise funds to light up major blocks of Chinatown. We hope you will join us.
lightUpChinatown.phase2: Phase 2: Light up Bayard Street to Pell Street
lightUpChinatown.phase3: Phase 3: Light up the rest of Chinatown
lightUpChinatown.ceremony1: Our big reveal of “Light Up Chinatown” is planned for the second week of December in celebration of the Winter Solstice. We hope you and your family will join us for this festive evening. Together, we can find light in the darkness.
lightUpChinatown.ceremony2: When you make a lantern donation, you will receive an email once we finalize the date and time.
lightUpChinatown.donationDescription1: 100% of the donations, no matter how big or small, will go towards permanent light fixtures and lanterns throughout Chinatown.
lightUpChinatown.donationDescription2: If you donate between $45 and $150 or more, you will be eligible to participate in “Adopt-a-Lantern” where you will be able to receive some perks with your generous donation.
lightUpChinatown.faqQuestion1: How will my donation for this project benefit Chinatown?
lightUpChinatown.faqAnswer1: Your donation will help permanently light up Chinatown streets and create a warm and welcoming ambience to ensure consistent foot traffic and the longevity of Chinatown businesses. For donations that qualify, you will receive a lantern and be invited to the Winter Solstice Lighting Ceremony.
lightUpChinatown.faqQuestion2: What is the Winter Solstice Celebration and Lighting Ceremony?
lightUpChinatown.faqAnswer2: Winter Solstice Celebration is an all-day event in Chinatown where everyone is welcomed to stop by to enjoy dining and shopping for the holidays. The Lighting Ceremony invitation will be sent to those who donated $150+ to our Light Up Chinatown Fundraising Campaign.
lightUpChinatown.faqQuestion3: I donated $150+, where can I pick up my personalized lantern?
lightUpChinatown.faqAnswer3: Pick up location is at CCBA, 62 Mott Street, New York, NY 10013. You will receive an email confirmation with detailed instructions on what time to pick up the lantern.
lightUpChinatown.faqQuestion4: I have not received an email confirmation. Who can I contact?
lightUpChinatown.faqAnswer4: Please contact us at <3>hello@sendchinatownlove.com</3> with the subject line “Light Up Chinatown”.
lightUpChinatown.faqQuestion5: I love Chinatown and I’d love to further support its businesses. Where can I do that?
lightUpChinatown.faqAnswer5: Thank you for sending Chinatown your love! To continue supporting this community, check out our <3>merchant page</3> for the full list of Asian-owned businesses we’re working with to make a donation or buy a gift card!
lightUpChinatown.donationDetail1: 1 x 10-inch lantern with your personalization hung on Mott Street
lightUpChinatown.donationDetail2: Funding permanent light fixtures throughout Chinatown
lightUpChinatown.donationDetail3: 1 x 12-inch lantern with your personalization hung on Mott Street
lightUpChinatown.donationDetail4: 1 x 12-inch custom designed lantern by a local artist to take home with you
lightUpChinatown.donationDetail5: An invitation to the Winter Solstice Celebration and lighting ceremony in December
